pageContext.claim: “He has no clue, that's for sure, and he just wants to lock up and throw away the keys, letting rioters and looters run wild. And you know what's interesting? They call 'em peaceful protesters. They burn down your cities, they do things that nobody's seen before, all in radical, left, Democrat-run cities and states, but cities, all of 'em, all of 'em...No, you know, the Republican-run cities are doing very well, the Republican-run cities.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump bizarrely often claims that all Black Lives Matter protesters and other demonstrators are violent anarchists. There have been riots, looting and violence instigated by some groups under FBI investigation, but most attendees are peacefully protesting police brutality against minorities and related issues, as countless reports and testimony from federal officials make clear. Moreover, there were demonstrations in cities across the country run by both parties, not just Democrats as Trump sometimes claims.
